name: planner-reminder-app
description: A modern, cross-platform Planner & Reminder App with PostgreSQL backend

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:backend
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && npm install && npx prisma generate
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run setup:frontend && cd backend && npm install
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma db push
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma db reset
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
scripts.clean:frontend: cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules .expo dist web-build

author: Planner App Team
